text:
@TeaPainUSA @traytaymakeup The exact same thing a MAGAt said to me in early March 2020, when I tried to discuss how dangerous the #coronavirus is. 

Man laughed at me & mocked #COVID19 because #DonaldTrump called it a hoax on #FoxNews. Right after that, he got bronchitis. I don't know if he's still alive.
